A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The positives for this movie are that I really liked seeing Mark Hamill and Carrie Fisher in their old roles again\, even though I thought the character of Luke Skywalker took a very strange direction. A lot of the open questions and mysteries from TFA are answered\, but not always in a way that makes sense.\nThings I disliked (trying to avoid spoilers): The movie had a lot of poor\, low-brow humor in it. One notable example is a prank call scene\, which was just awful. A lot of the twists and surprises simply didn't work. M. Night Shyamalan could come up with better plot twists. The entire Finn & Rose subplot was truly awful. It had practically no payoff or purpose whatsoever.
